main_title: Marie Antoinette's Secret Gambling Scandal Revealed
hook: [shocked] Get this: Marie Antoinette’s lavish parties weren’t just for fun—they masked a secret gambling ring! In 1780s Versailles, nobles lost fortunes while France's treasury bled dry.
description: Marie Antoinette's secret gambling in Versailles drained France's treasury, fueling the Revolution. Unbelievable! #MarieAntoinette #FrenchRevolution #History
